title: Automate raw data into different excel sheets and send emails
snippet:
I get a daily email with raw data. What you need to do is:
1. Grab data from email / or I can save it in a folder
2. Insert cross reference using V-lookup: The raw data has list of sites. Each site i identified as site ID. Those site IDs are external IDs, those needs to be converted to internal site IDs. Another column can be inserted that contain internal site IDs.
3. Each site ID has multiple data lines. A separate spreadsheet needs to be created for each site that will have only the relevant lines. 
4. Each spreadsheet needs to be sent out to individual site's email id.
